title: sujonali1819
author: sujonali1819
content: Hi, as I said in the title, Do you know any telegram group where a lot of gamblers from the biggest casinos are discussing each other? If you are in some such group please share them here. I believe there are some groups but I can not find them, unfortunately . Thank you

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: I don't know one but it would be a good thing I guess if there is any, especially a groupchat wherein players from different gambling platforms and different gambling gamed could meet and talk about things or share things with one another. This forum for example, wherein investors and gamblers are interacting with one another. But for sure there will be people to be up against such concept throwing questions such as "why and what for". Advantages could be sharing of strategies or picks perhaps. But inspite of these advantages, groupchatd could also promote FUDs which would put the money of new ones at risk if they'd follow those informations. So I hope down ends are being limited if such groups do really exist.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: I'm not on those groups too so I was little bit curious if there really is and landed to find this link: https://www.telegram-groups.com/gambling-telegram-group/ but as far as I clicking some links most of it are abandoned in moderation and you can see lot of affiliate links, most are in local especially Russian and others are dead links. Maybe there is but likely in private and who knows one in here is a member.

comments.author: QueenVera
comments.body: It will be a nice place to be especially for people who will love to try out several casinos.I personally don't see the need of joining these groups especially because of some rumor of scammers present in such groups and you never can tell as the internet is a very wide place to be and no one is to be trusted.Just incase anyone has a functional link to a group that truly accepts genuine persons then do well to sahre with us as we also look forward to meeting some other persons who have similar Interest in gambling from a different casino.

comments.author: chaser15
comments.body: Quote from: sujonali1819 on March 04, 2023, 03:27:25 PMHi, as I said in the title, Do you know any telegram group where a lot of gamblers from the biggest casinos are discussing each other? If you are in some such group please share them here. I believe there are some groups but I can not find them, unfortunately . Thank youI think if we talk about general gambling, I doubt there's a reputable Telegram group for that. What I mean about general gambling is, there are no groups that composed of both casino gamblers and sports bettors as they are having a different approach, styles, strategies and so on.|Pointing to sports betting groups, there are groups of gamblers in sports betting but limited only in particular and specific sports. Answering OP's question, I didn't know some TG groups but maybe his best shot is to look for it on Discord.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: I have never thought there is a place where gambling discussions in the telegram group but will be more happy if someone who knows can share it maybe the OP will also be happy and I myself just want how the discussion occurs or in the discord doesn't matter if it shares it.But as long as I play gambling for a few years I have never found about the gambling discussion group and this is rarely found, maybe we have dahi that gambling has become commonplace so that there is no active community in the one Group discussion in a channel. Just my assumption.

comments.author: leonair
comments.body: Quote from: sujonali1819 on March 04, 2023, 03:27:25 PMHi, as I said in the title, Do you know any telegram group where a lot of gamblers from the biggest casinos are discussing each other? If you are in some such group please share them here. I believe there are some groups but I can not find them, unfortunately . Thank youI really don't know about such telegram group. Because I think it's almost impossible to find such telegram group because there is a lot of spam in telegram which makes it very rare to find authentic members in a group.  And when it comes to gambling it is even more difficult. But you can follow Discord servers of gambling sites without following Telegram where you can find authentic gamblers. And that would be a possible medium.  But if you are satisfied with telegram group then you can search it its totally up to you.  Hope if anyone knows from here they will share it with you

On 2nd link, it is a channel.3rd= Channel4th= group5th= Duplicate6th= Channel7th= Channel8th= Channel9th= Duplicate10th= Channel11th= Leafpool - Mining Pool (group)12th= Channel13th= Channel14th= Bitcoin Saudi Arabia (group)15th= Channel16th= Channel17th= Channel18th= Lightning | LIGHT (group)19th= Bitcoin Lover (group)20th= ChannelSo,in the first 20 I have found only 1 gambling group and that's why I have no patience to check the rest.

comments.author: ralle14
comments.created_time: March 05, 2023, 01:42:59 AMLast edit: March 05, 2023, 01:56:07 AM by ralle14
comments.body: I also have to agree with chaser15, i've joined a few crypto betting groups on telegram but unfortunately, they're barely active so I don't think it's worth recommending them. My suggestion is to try and use other platforms like Discord as they're probably one of the better places to look for gambling groups since the discussion will be much cleaner if there would be several channels compared to a single channel on telegram that can easily bury other topics.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: Quote from: ralle14 on March 05, 2023, 01:42:59 AMI also have to agree with chaser15, i've joined a few crypto betting groups on telegram but unfortunately, they're barely active so I don't think it's worth recommending them. My suggestion is to try and use other platforms like Discord as they're probably one of the better places to look for gambling groups since the discussion will be much cleaner if there would be several channels compared to a single channel on telegram that can easily bury other topics.I agree, I like discord more than Telegram as it looks cleaner and more arranged. Also, finding invite links are scattered all over the internet.If OP has a discord account try this link that I found. https://disboard.org/servers/tag/GamblingThose are invitations where you could just click the links and then redirect you to discord but you may need to get a role first so you could view the other channels. I tried some of them and they are offering free trials for a week and then you will need to pay for the succeeding monthly subscription. I say just take advantage of the free trials and then jump to another if you don't want to continue.

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: Most internet niches have their own subreddit, and from those subreddits, they usually have communication channels like Discord to hang out. From what I have found, there are two subreddits that are still pretty active.- https://www.reddit.com/r/CryptoGambling/ - Discord- https://www.reddit.com/r/onlinegambling/ - Discord

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: I never looked for telegram groups about gambling. But I suggest you try to find it directly from Telegram by entering keywords in your Telegram. And from there, you can see lists of gambling groups there.I tried looking it up and found some groups, but I don't know what's in them. You can also search for it yourself by using the keywords you want.@gamblinginformation, @chatGC, @gamblingkf, @gamblingi and it seems there are many other gambling groups. But be careful with those gambling groups because we don't know the risks.

If you are in some such group please share them here. I believe there are some groups but I can not find them, unfortunately . Thank youI don't think you will find it and besides people who are busy gambling don't have much time to chat with other gamblers, at least you will find it in casino chat rooms nothing more than that, if there is maybe I will monitor it from this thread, because usually the telegram group is only available for the community of traders or bounty hunters as I know it's rare to find gamblers groups in the telegram group.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: sujonali1819 on March 04, 2023, 03:27:25 PMHi, as I said in the title, Do you know any telegram group where a lot of gamblers from the biggest casinos are discussing each other? If you are in some such group please share them here. I believe there are some groups but I can not find them, unfortunately . Thank youIf you cannot get any credible gathering of gamblers on telegram, I think you can also consider starting your own. Some other people here in this forum and elsewhere may be interested in joining this kind of group and maybe have been searching to find one but still have not. An extra advantage for you who starts is that you can vet the group and be confident in its credibility. There are a lot of dubious telegram groups theses days, starting your own ensures that you are in the right place. You may start small, but with time you will increase.

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: Quote from: sujonali1819 on March 04, 2023, 03:27:25 PMHi, as I said in the title, Do you know any telegram group where a lot of gamblers from the biggest casinos are discussing each other? If you are in some such group please share them here. I believe there are some groups but I can not find them, unfortunately . Thank youPlease be careful in your quest to finding a gambling discussion group on the social media platform as there are many fraudulent and scammer's groups out there in the disguise of gambling discussion group or platform that pretend to be informing members on gambling tips and so-called free VIP odds. So even go to the extent of asking a new member to pay membership fees to be able to have access to these supposed VIP odds only to block you or remove you from the group after payment.

If you are in some such group please share them here. I believe there are some groups but I can not find them, unfortunately . Thank you@sujonali1819, to be honest I often see some links about: Online Casino Telegram Group, but I never seriously joined them.I used to, once tried to join several telegram groups about sports betting analysis and active telegrams discussing all things betting in online casinos, but the longer the conversation got weirder, they really can't help me in placing bets whether it's slots, poker, sports, predictions and so on, for that I stopped joining various types of online casino telegram groups.Maybe, if you want to find some tips about roulette, blackjack, etc., maybe you can try to check the link that I put above, who knows it can help you.
